swe2013.dao

Interface BookingDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SqlBookingDAO

    public interface BookingDAO
    Booking DAO
    Author:
    Anreiter Simon, Moser Victoria Dorothy, Kocman Andreas Interface for storing booking data

    • Method Detail

      • saveBooking

        void saveBooking(long hotelID,
               long roomID,
               long customerID,
               java.util.Date beginDate,
               java.util.Date endDate)
        saves a new booking to the SQL DB
        Parameters:
        hotelID - the ID of the hotel
        roomID - the ID of the specific room that is booked
        customerID - the ID of the customer booking the room
        beginDate - the date of arrival
        endDate - the date of departure

      • getBookingsForRoom

        Bookings getBookingsForRoom(long hotelID,
                          long roomID)
        returns all bookings for a room
        Parameters:
        hotelID - The ID of the hotel
        roomID - The ID of the room
        Returns:
        a Bookings Object consisting of all bookings for a specific room

      • userBookedHotel

        boolean userBookedHotel(long userID,
                      long hotelID)
        Checks if a specific user booked a certain hotel
        Parameters:
        userID - the ID of the user
        hotelID - the ID of the hotel
        Returns:
        true if bookings are available in the db for a specific user, false if not

      • bookingsForUser

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> bookingsForUser(long userID)
